title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still cannot access it.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is not responding.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customerâ€™s billing address shows a different city even after updating it.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android devices.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not yet received the amount.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving two-factor authentication codes on their registered phone number.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer encounters an error while uploading a new profile picture.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer wants to enable auto-renewal for their subscription but the option is disabled.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but did not receive a confirmation email even though payment succeeded.
